iati-activity.title: WaterAid Malawi
iati-activity.description: WaterAid has been working in Malawi since 1999 and works in partnership with district governments, a local non governmental organisation (NGO), a church-based organisation and a public water company.WaterAid is concentrating on rehabilitating existing water systems in Malawi rather than building new ones. We help communities to set up water and sanitation committees which have responsibility for the overall management of water projects.
iati-activity.participating-org: AMEPPE-Association Malienne pour l’Education du Public et la Protection de l’Environnement
